EmailTemplate.subject: Join Us to Personally Experience Flight Demo at the King Air Gathering, Fredericksburg, Texas (T82)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://www.bendixking.com/]]>
Experience the BendixKing AeroVue <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/products/aerovue]]> Integrated Flight Deck in a one-hour flight demo at King Air Gathering III <[[http://www.kingairgathering.com]]> in Fredericksburg, Texas from Sept. 27 to 30!
BendixKing AeroVue Integrated Flight Deck offers:
- Lowers recurring maintenance costs - Meets the ADS-B mandate - Reduces pilot workload and fatigue, increases safety - Reduces aircraft weight up to 125 LBS - Includes industry-leading SmartView™ synthetic vision system - Optional weather radar, XM weather, radar altimeter, traffic alert, ground proximity warning
Limited seats are available. Sign up for the demo today and experience the state of the art glass cockpit for your B200.
SIGN UP NOW <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/AeroVue_Flight_Demo.html]]>
